course_name: BSc (Hons) in Information Technology - Software Engineering
explanation: This course at the campus is well-suited for students interested in Information Technology pursuing careers in Software Engineer, Data Scientist. The program offers flexible study options over the course duration and provides comprehensive training leading to opportunities in various career paths.
career_opportunities: Software Engineer, Business Analyst, Full Stack Developer, UX Engineer, Software Architect, Project Manager, Business Analytics, Android Developer, iOS Developer, Systems Analyst, Information Security Analyst, Software Quality Assurance
requirements: Local A/Ls: Minimum of 3 “S” passes in the Physical Sciences stream or Engineering Technology stream in one sitting OR 3 “S” passes in any stream (other than Physical Science/Engineering Technology) with a “C” pass for O/L Mathematics and completing the IT Bridging Program. Cambridge/Edexcel A/Ls: Minimum of 3 “D” passes in Mathematics-related subjects OR 3 “D” passes in any other subjects with a “C” pass for O/L Mathematics and completing the IT Bridging Program. Must meet minimum GPA at end of 2nd Year 1st Semester and pass the SLIIT Aptitude Test.
